metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25220 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The Linux kernel 4.9.x before 4.9.233, 4.14.x before 4.14.194, and 4.19.x before 4.19.140 has a use-after-free because skcd->no_refcnt was not considered during a backport of a CVE-2020-14356 patch. This is related to the cgroups feature.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25220` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-9-generic - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-5.4.0-9-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-9-generic - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-9-lowlatency - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-9-snapdragon - 5.4.0-9.12
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-1005-aws - 5.4.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1006-azure - 5.4.0-1006.6
No subscription required

No subscription required
